feed.title: Cleanuperr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.5.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix weird time zone display name on startup by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/70

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.5.7...v1.5.8

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.5.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix notifications failing when poster image is not set by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/78

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.5.8...v1.5.9

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.5.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add option to ignore specific downloads by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/79

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.5.9...v1.5.10

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.5.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Disable cleanup on torrent items if download client is not configured by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/85

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.5.10...v1.5.11

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.5.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix patterns being loaded for disabled arrs by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/80
  • Fix multiple runs on queue cleaner when download cleaner is enabled by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/90
  • Fix notifications when poster is not found by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/89
  • Restrict max strikes to a minimum value by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/87
  • Update docs by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/88

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.5.11...v1.5.12
